resources.string: "The renewed certificates are now available on the “Certificates” tab."
"An technical error has occurred. Please contact the technical hotline via App Information -> Technical Hotline."
"Your Internet connection may have been lost. Please check the connection and try again."
"An error occurred during the renewal of your certificate. Please try again. If the error persists, please contact the technical hotline via App Information -> Technical Hotline."

"The certificate has already been reissued three times. It cannot be reissued again."
"We recommend exporting your reissued certificate as a PDF and printing it out. You can then scan it again at any time."
"Your certificate cannot be renewed. Please contact the technical hotline via App Information -> Technical Hotline."
"Renewing your certificates is voluntary and free of charge."

"To ensure that certificates can only be renewed once, the identifiers of the old and new certificates are documented by the RKI. The other data from your certificates is deleted by the RKI immediately after the renewal."
"Old certificates will be moved automatically to the recycle bin and deleted after 30 days. Certificates can be restored at any time within these 30 days."
"If you cancel now, you can request a renewal in the certificate overview at any time."

"The following certificates will be issued during the renewal as additional information, to adopt the previous sequence of vaccinations and recoveries in the new certificate. These certificates will not be renewed."
"Before renewing certificates of family members, please make sure that the person involved consents."

"In certain cases, further certificates are issued in addition to the certificates for renewal. This is necessary to adopt the previous sequence of vaccinations and recoveries in the new certificates."
